sentences.en: A page came loose and floated onto the tiles.
sentences.cn: 有一页纸脱落下来，飘落到地砖上。

sentences.en: Answers can be found at the bottom of page 8.
sentences.cn: 在第8页末尾可以找到答案。

sentences.en: Be sure to read about how mozzarella is made, on page 65.
sentences.cn: 务必看看莫泽雷勒干酪是怎么制成的，在第65页。

sentences.en: Clarence Page is a columnist for the Chicago Tribune.
sentences.cn: 克拉伦斯·佩奇是《芝加哥论坛报》的专栏作家。

sentences.en: Draw a line down that page's center.
sentences.cn: 沿那一页的中心画一条竖线。

sentences.en: He handed each of them a page of photos.
sentences.cn: 他给他们每个人一版照片。

sentences.en: Page is well versed in many styles of jazz.
sentences.cn: 佩奇精通多种风格的爵士乐。

sentences.en: Page Mode shows headers, footers, footnotes and page numbers.
sentences.cn: 页面模式可以显示页眉、页脚、脚注和页码。

sentences.en: The 350-page report was based on statements from witnesses to the events.
sentences.cn: 这份350页的报告是根据各位证人对这些事件的证词写成的。

sentences.en: The correct answers can be found at the bottom of page 8.
The full address is given on page 15.
The Guardian's front page carries a photograph of the two foreign ministers.
sentences.cn: 《卫报》的头版刊登了两国外交部长的一张合影。

sentences.en: There was a double-page spread of a dinner for 46 people.
sentences.cn: 有一张横贯两版的、由46人参加的宴席的照片。

sentences.en: To enter, simply complete the coupon on page 150.
sentences.cn: 要想参加，只需填写第150页的参赛表格。

sentences.en: We took out a full page advertisement in the ‘Village Voice’.
sentences.cn: 我们在《村声》上投放了一整版广告。

sentences.en: Where's your book? Take it out and turn to page 4.
sentences.cn: 你的书呢？拿出来，翻到第4页。

sentences.en: You will find the answers over the page .

words.tran_cn: 用传呼机传呼（page的现在分词形式）
[计]页；记录；大事件，时期；男侍者

phrases.tran_cn: 上一页，前一页；返回上一级菜单
黄页（国际上对商业电话号码薄的固定称谓）

trans.tran_cn: 页，（计算机的）页面，年史，<文>重要事件
trans.tran_en: one side of a piece of paper in a book, newspaper, document etc, or the sheet of paper itself

trans.tran_cn: 标记…的页数，翻页，喊出名字以寻找，（在公共传呼系统上）呼叫
